mapper.sql: a.id, a.appealID, a.appealTime, a.appealType, a.positionID, a.appealReason, a.userID, a.situationAppeal, a.processing, a.createTime, a.updateTime, a.version, a.isDeleted, a.createBy, a.updateBy

where 1=1 and a.id = #{condition.id} and a.appealID = #{condition.appealID} and a.appealTime = #{condition.appealTime} and a.appealType = #{condition.appealType} and a.positionID = #{condition.positionID} and a.appealReason = #{condition.appealReason} and a.userID = #{condition.userID} and a.situationAppeal = #{condition.situationAppeal} and a.processing = #{condition.processing} and a.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and a.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and a.version = #{condition.version} and a.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and a.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and a.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy}

where 1=1 and a.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(a.appealID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.appealID}),'%')) and UPPER(a.appealTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.appealTime}),'%')) and UPPER(a.appealType) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.appealType}),'%')) and UPPER(a.positionID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.positionID}),'%')) and UPPER(a.appealReason) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.appealReason}),'%')) and UPPER(a.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(a.situationAppeal) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.situationAppeal}),'%')) and UPPER(a.processing) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.processing}),'%')) and UPPER(a.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(a.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(a.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(a.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(a.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(a.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%'))
mapper.update: update appealhandle set appealID=#{appealID}, appealTime=#{appealTime}, appealType=#{appealType}, positionID=#{positionID}, appealReason=#{appealReason}, userID=#{userID}, situationAppeal=#{situationAppeal}, processing=#{processing}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from appealhandle a where a.id = #{id} and a.isDeleted = false
mapper.sql: a.id as 'id', a.version as 'version',a.appealID as 'appealID',a.appealTime as 'appealTime',a.appealType as 'appealType',a.positionID as 'positionID',a.appealReason as 'appealReason',a.userID as 'userID',a.situationAppeal as 'situationAppeal',a.processing as 'processing', attachmentList.id as 'attachmentList.id', attachmentList.version as 'attachmentList.version',attachmentList.datestr as 'attachmentList.datestr',attachmentList.path as 'attachmentList.path',attachmentList.name as 'attachmentList.name',attachmentList.title as 'attachmentList.title',attachmentList.type as 'attachmentList.type',attachmentList.refID as 'attachmentList.refID'
mapper.select: select , p.title as 'positionTitle', su.realName as 'appealName', su.phoneNumber as 'appealTel', psu.realName as 'positionName', psu.phoneNumber as 'positionTel' from appealhandle a left join attachment attachmentList on a.id = attachmentList.refID left join position p on p.id = a.positionID left join shiro_user su on su.id = a.userID left join shiro_user psu on psu.id = p.userID ${orderByClause}
